Text.Page:
You can summon and fight against monsters matching your item level.

[Caution]
You can only receive rewards for each monster level (1-5) once per day.
You cannot receive rewards for defeating monsters higher than your item level.
You can only enter the Training Camp 5 times per day.

For example: Players with item level 515 can kill monsters level 1 to 5 and earn rewards from them.

Players with item level 510, on the other hand, can only kill monsters up to level 3 to earn rewards. They may still enter the Training Camp twice more, but won't receive any further rewards.
